markdownRemark.html:
It’s a new year! January 1st 2019. And I know you have probably heard this a thousand times by now, but happy new year pal! And its coming from the bottom of my heart.

In the spirit of new year, I decided to take Dan Abramov’s advice and start a blog, something I have procrastinated for so long.

For the over five years now, I have been doing web development, and I kind of feel bad that I have not had the push to start this sooner.

Here I will be sharing my thoughts and things I’ve learned over the years
